title: A iustification or cleering of the Prince of Orendge agaynst the false sclaunders, wherewith his ilwillers goe about to charge him wrongfully. Translated out of French by Arthur Goldyng
author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.
publisher: By Iohn Day, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate. Febr. 24. These bookes are to be sold at his long shop at the west doore of Paules,
